the_Manor

Class Fight

  • java.lang.Object
    • the_Manor.Fight

  • public class Fight
extends java.lang.Object

    This class allow to make a fight happens between the player and an enemy.

    As the player enters in a room, if there is a enemy in this room, the fight is launched.

    Version:
    05/12/16
    Author:
    Group 6

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fight(Player player, Enemy enemy)
      The constructor of the class Fight.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(Fighter fight)
      Allows a fighter to launch an attack If the fighter is a player and he has enough stamina, he will remove some health of the enemy but his stamina will goes down according to the power of his attack If the fighter is an enemy and he has enough stamina, he will remove some health of the player but his stamina will goes down according to the power of his attack
      Enemy getEnemy()
      To know who is the enemy in the room.
      Player getPlayer()
      To know who is the player in the room.
      void recup(Fighter fighter)
      Allows the fighter to get some stamina back according to his attack value.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        To know who is the player in the room.
        Returns:
        The player in the room.

      • getEnemy

        public Enemy getEnemy()
        To know who is the enemy in the room.
        Returns:
        The enemy in the room.

      • attack

        public void attack(Fighter fight)

        Allows a fighter to launch an attack

        If the fighter is a player and he has enough stamina, he will remove some health of the enemy but his stamina will goes down according to the power of his attack

        If the fighter is an enemy and he has enough stamina, he will remove some health of the player but his stamina will goes down according to the power of his attack

        Parameters:
        fight - The fighter launching the attack

      • recup

        public void recup(Fighter fighter)
        Allows the fighter to get some stamina back according to his attack value.
        Parameters:
        fighter - The fighter that will get some stamina back.
